entry.title: WIND WARNING, Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 a.m. MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight then changing to periods of snow or rain before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then to 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
